org.dolan.searcher

Interface IFileReaderContainer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileReaderContainer

    public interface IFileReaderContainer
    The Interface IFileReaderContainer. This file container is a wrapper for the BufferedReader and the Cache used for searching.

    • Method Summary
